Description: table type
Permissible Values: sequencing_experiment

Description: Unique identifier of the sequencing experiment, assigned by the data provider.
Permissible Values: String values that meet the regular expression ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9\\-_\\.:']{0,98}[a-zA-Z0-9]{1}$

Description: ARGO Program ID, the unique identifier of your program. If you have logged into the ARGO Data Platform, this is the Program ID that you see in the Program Services area.
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
Permissible Values: Values must meet the regular expression  ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\._]{1,64}
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Description of the donor self-reported gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.
Permissible Values: Female Male Other
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.
Permissible Values: Values must meet the regular expression ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\._]{1,64}
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Tissue source of the biospecimen.
Permissible Values: Blood derived - bone marrow, Blood derived - peripheral blood, Blood derived, Bone marrow, Bone. Buccal cell,Buffy coat,Cerebellum,Cerebrospinal fluid,Endometrium,Esophagus,Intestine,Lymph node,Mononuclear cells from bone marrow,Other,Plasma,Pleural effusion,Saliva,Serum,Skin,Solid tissue,Spleen,Sputum,Stomach,Tonsil,Urine
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Description of specimens tumour/normal status for data processing.
Permissible Values: Normal Tumour
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Description of the kind of specimen that was collected with respect to tumour/normal tissue origin.
Permissible Values: Cell line - derived from normal  Cell line - derived from tumour  Cell line - derived from xenograft tumour  Metastatic tumour - additional metastatic  Metastatic tumour - metastasis local to lymph node  Metastatic tumour - metastasis to distant location  Metastatic tumour  Normal - tissue adjacent to primary tumour  Normal  Primary tumour - additional new primary  Primary tumour - adjacent to normal  Primary tumour  Recurrent tumour  Xenograft - derived from primary tumour  Xenograft - derived from tumour cell line
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Unique identifier of the sample, assigned by the data provider. If submitted along with BAM molecular data, must also be present in header SM, and values must meet the regular expression  ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\._]{1,64}
Permissible Values: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Description of the type of molecular sample used for testing.
Permissible Values: Amplified DNA ctDNA Other DNA enrichments Other RNA fractions polyA+ RNA Ribo-Zero RNA Total DNA Total RNA
Note: Must be the same as what is in sample_registration table

Description: Provide the identifier of matched normal sample used for data analysis.
Permissible Values: Values must meet the regular expression ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\._]{1,64} or null
Note: Required for WGS and WXS tumour samples

Description: The number of read groups in the molecular files being submitted.
Permissible Values: A minimum of 1 is required.

Description: The sequencing platform type used in data generation. Can also be specified within Bam header "PL"
Permissible Values: CAPILLARY, LS454, ILLUMINA, SOLID, HELICOS, IONTORRENT, ONT, PACBIO, Nanopore, BGI

Description: The primary experimental method. For sequencing data it refers to how the sequencing library was made.
Permissible Values: WGS, WXS, RNA-Seq, Bisulfite-Seq, ChIP-Seq, Targeted-Seq

Description: Date sequencing was performed.
Permissible Values: datetime format, for example: 2019-06-16 or 2019-06-16T20:20:39+00:00 or null

Description: The model number of the sequencing machine used in data generation. Can also be specified within Bam header "PM"
Permissible Values: Any string value or null

Description: Data centre sequencing was performed. Can also be specified with Bam header "CN"
Permissible Values: Any string value or null

Description: Description that can uniquely identify a target capture kit.
Permissible Values: xGen Exome Research Panel V1 (IDT), SeqCap EZ MedExome (Roche), SureSelect Human All Exon V6 (Agilent), Human Core Exome Kit + RefSeq V1 (Twist) null

Description: Provide the protocol used to isolate RNAs
Permissible Values: TRIzol Reagent (Thermo Fisher), RNeasy kits (QIAGEN), RNase free DNase I (Thermo Fisher), Pico Pure RNA isolation kit (Thermo Fisher), mirVANA microRNA isolation kit (Thermo Fisher), Absolutely Total RNA, miRNA & mRNA Purification Kits (Stratagene, Agilent technologies), SV total RNA isolation kit (Promega), RNAqueous Kit (Thermo Fisher), AllPrep DNA/RNA Micro Kit (QIAGEN), GenElute Mammalian Total RNA Miniprep kit (MilliporeSigma), Spectrum Plant Total RNA kit (MilliporeSigma), peqGOLD Total RNA kits (PeqLab Biotechnologie), RNAlater (Thermo Fisher) null

Description: Provide the kit being used for library construction
Permissible Values: Ovation SoLo kit (NuGEN), SMARTer Stranded Total RNA-Seq Kit (Takara), TruSeq RNA sample preparation v2 (Illumina), SMART-Seq v4 Ultra Low Input RNA Kit (Takara), Nextera XT DNA Library Preparation Kit (Illumina), NEXTflex kit (Bioo Scientific) null

Description: Indicate the data strandedness
Permissible Values: UNSTRANDED, FIRST_READ_SENSE_STRAND, FIRST_READ_ANTISENSE_STRAND null

Description: RNA integrity number
Permissible Values: A number between 1 to 10 or null

Description: The percentage of RNA fragments that are >200 nucleotides in size
Permissible Values: A percentage or null

Description: Indicate if include spike ins?
Permissible Values: true, false

Description: Name of FASTA file that contains the spike-in sequences
Permissible Values: Any string value or null. Must match a fileName identified in the files section.

Description: Spike in concentration
Permissible Values: String or null
